mapper.sql: springId, beanClass, methodName, params, cronExpression, jobStatus, jobName, jobGroup, isConcurrent, updateTime, createTime, description
mapper.select: select jobId, from t_job where user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_job (
) values ( #{springId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beanClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cronExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isConcurrent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
